Qieyun: 知開三脂去?, 章開三眞入?

English: to boil; to cook; to heat
to change; to alter; to transform

Qieyun: 定開四青去?, 端開四青去?
English: to fix; to settle; to arrange
solid state of matter; solid substance
to flow; to move about. a kind; a class

Qieyun: 溪開三微去?, 曉開三微去?

English: gaseous state of matter; gaseous substance

Qieyun: 以三尤平?, 以三尤去?

English: to come to. now; immediately. even; if; then. a consequential particle. to be near; almost; nearly.
to sum up; in a word
an age; one's life. the world

Qieyun: 澄開三魚平?, 知開三魚上?, 知開三魚去?, 知開三陽入?, 澄開三陽入?
English: to make manifest; to display; to excel; conspicuous
